name: Trail (itch) (NickFate)
description:
Trail - is top-dawn shooter, currently in development. 

In the plans
- make the tank shoot
- add music and sounds
- redraw textures
- add brains to allies and enemies
etc.

I'm leaving for a week, after which I will immediately release a major update

Control
LBM|Space - shoot
WASD - movement

the current version is 0.5m
